class="code"><pre><span class="line">&#123; </span><br><span class="line"> &quot;usingComponents&quot;: &#123; </span><br><span class="line"> &quot;toastdemo&quot;: &quot;/components/toastdemo/toastdemo&quot; </span><br><span class="line"> &#125; </span><br><span class="line">&#125;</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <ul> <li>接着在index.wxml中引用</li> <li>然后在index.js进行配置</li> <li>使用时直接执行this.toastdemo.showToast(‘弹框组件调用成功’,2000)就可以了</li> </ul> <h2 id="7、小程序内的页面跳转"><a href="#7、小程序内的页面跳转" class="headerlink" title="7、小程序内的页面跳转"></a>7、<strong>小程序内的页面跳转</strong></h2><ul> <li>wx.navigateTo——保留当前页面，跳转到应用内的某个页面。但是不能跳到 tabbar 页面（参数必须为字符串）</li> <li>wx.redirectTo——关闭当前页面，跳转到应用内的某个页面。但是不允许跳转到 tabbar 页面</li> <li>wx.switchTab——跳转到 tabBar 页面，并关闭其他所有非 tabBar 页面，路径后不能带参数</li> <li>wx.navigateBack——关闭当前页面，返回上一页面或多级页面。可通过 getCurrentPages() 获取当前的页面栈，决定需要返回几层</li> <li>wx.reLaunch——关闭所有页面，打开到应用内的某个页面</li> </ul> <h2 id="8、小程序和Vue写法的区别"><a href="#8、小程序和Vue写法的区别" class="headerlink" title="8、小程序和Vue写法的区别"></a>8、<strong>小程序和Vue写法的区别</strong></h2><ul> <li>循环遍历：小程序是wx:for=”list”，vue是v-for=”inforin list”</li> <li>调用data模型：小程序是this.data.unifo，vue是this.unifo</li> <li>给模型赋值：小程序是this.setData({unifo:1})，vue是直接this.unifo=1</li> </ul> <h2 id="9、小程序的双向绑定和vue哪里不一样"><a href="#9、小程序的双向绑定和vue哪里不一样" class="headerlink" title="9、小程序的双向绑定和vue哪里不一样"></a>9、<strong>小程序的双向绑定和vue哪里不一样</strong></h2><ul> <li>小程序直接this.data的属性是不可以同步到视图的，必须调用this.setData({})</li> </ul> <h2 id="10、小程序的优点和缺点"><a href="#10、小程序的优点和缺点" class="headerlink" title="10、小程序的优点和缺点"></a>10、<strong>小程序的优点和缺点</strong></h2><p><strong>小程序的优点</strong></p> <ul> <li>无需下载</li> <li>打开速度快</li> <li>开发成本低</li> <li>为用户提供良好的安全保障。发布有一套严格的审查流程，不能通过审查的程序无法发布上线</li> <li>服务请求快</li> </ul> <p><strong>小程序的缺点</strong></p> <ul> <li>依托微信，不能开发后台管理功能</li> <li>大小限制不能超过2M，不能打开超过5个层级的页面</li> </ul> <h2 id="11、简述小程序原理"><a href="#11、简述小程序原理" class="headerlink" title="11、简述小程序原理"></a>11、<strong>简述小程序原理</strong></h2><p>小程序分为两个部分webview和appService，webview用来展现UI，appService用来处理业务逻辑、数据及接口调用，它们在两个进程中运行，通过系统层JSBridge实现通信，完成UI渲染、事件处理。</p> <h2 id="12、提高小程序的应用速度的方法"><a href="#12、提高小程序的应用速度的方法" class="headerlink" title="12、提高小程序的应用速度的方法"></a>12、<strong>提高小程序的应用速度的方法</strong></h2><ul> <li>减少默认data的大小</li> <li>组件化方案，公用的如弹框等写个自定义的组件，然后调用</li> </ul> <h2 id="13、简述小程序原理"><a href="#13、简述小程序原理" class="headerlink" title="13、简述小程序原理"></a>13、<strong>简述小程序原理</strong></h2><p>小程序分为两个部分webview和appService，webview用来展现UI，appService用来处理业务逻辑、数据及接口调用，它们在两个进程中运行，通过系统层JSBridge实现通信，完成UI渲染、事件处理</p> <h2 id="14、setData的回调函数"><a href="#14、setData的回调函数" class="headerlink" title="14、setData的回调函数"></a>14、<strong>setData的回调函数</strong></h2><p>微信小程序的setData实现是和react的setData实现类似的，所以它也是一个异步函数，并且有回调函数的参数，当然平时小量数据我们可能并没有感觉到它的异步，但是为了确保逻辑的正确执行，在需要用到setData后 data里的数据的步骤，请写入setData的回调函数中，如下示例：</p> <figure class="highlight plaintext"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">this.setData(&#123;</span><br><span class="line"> a: this.data.a++</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;,()=&gt;&#123;</span><br><span class="line">&#125;)</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h2 id="15、如何实现下拉刷新"><a href="#15、如何实现下拉刷新" class="headerlink" title="15、如何实现下拉刷新"></a>15、<strong>如何实现下拉刷新</strong></h2><ul> <li>先在app.json或page.json中配置enablePullDownRefresh:true</li> <li>page里用onPullDownRefresh函数，在下拉刷新时执行</li> <li>在下拉函数执行时发起数据请求，请求返回后，调用wx.stopPullDownRefresh停止下拉刷新的状态</li> </ul> <h2 id="16、bindtap和catchtap的区别是什么"><a href="#16、bindtap和catchtap的区别是什么" class="headerlink" title="16、bindtap和catchtap的区别是什么"></a>16、<strong>bindtap和catchtap的区别是什么</strong></h2><ul> <li>bindtap不会阻止冒泡事件，catchtap阻止冒泡</li> </ul> <h2 id="17、微信小程序与H5的区别？"><a href="#17、微信小程序与H5的区别？" class="headerlink" title="17、微信小程序与H5的区别？"></a>17、微信小程序与H5的区别？</h2><p>①运行环境不同（小程序在微信运行，h5在浏览器运行）；</p> <p>②开发成本不同（h5需要兼容不同的浏览器）；</p> <p>③获取系统权限不同（系统级权限可以和小程序无缝衔接）；</p> <p>④应用在生产环境的运行流畅度（h5需不断对项目优化来提高用户体验）</p> <h2 id="18、小程序关联微信公众号如何确定用户的唯一性？"><a href="#18、小程序关联微信公众号如何确定用户的唯一性？" class="headerlink" title="18、小程序关联微信公众号如何确定用户的唯一性？"></a>18、小程序关联微信公众号如何确定用户的唯一性？</h2><p>使用wx.getUserInfo方法 withCredentials为true时，可获取encryptedData，里面有union_id.后端需要进行对称解密。</p> <h2 id="19、webview中的页面怎么跳回小程序中"><a href="#19、webview中的页面怎么跳回小程序中" class="headerlink" title="19、webview中的页面怎么跳回小程序中"></a>19、<strong>webview中的页面怎么跳回小程序中</strong></h2><ul> <li>先在管理后台配置域名白名单，</li> <li>然后引入jweixin-1.3.2.js（<a href="https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https://res.wx.qq.com/open/js/jweixin-1.3.0.js%EF%BC%89" rel="external nofollow noreferrer">https://res.wx.qq.com/open/js/jweixin-1.3.0.js）</a></li> </ul> <figure class="highlight plaintext"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">wx.miniProgram.navigateTo(&#123;url: &#x27;/pages/login/login&#x27;+&#x27;$params&#x27;&#125;)</span><br><span class="line">wx.miniProgram.navigateTo(&#123;url: &#x27;/path/to/page&#x27;&#125;)</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h2 id="20、简述微信小程序原理"><a href="#20、简述微信小程序原理" class="headerlink" title="20、简述微信小程序原理"></a>20、简述微信小程序原理</h2><p>微信小程序采用 <code>JavaScript</code>、<code>WXML</code>、<code>WXSS</code> 三种技术进行开发,本质就是一个单页面应用，所有的页面渲染和事件处理，都在一个页面内进行，但又可以通过微信客户端调用原生的各种接口微信的架构，是数据驱动的架构模式，它的 <code>UI</code> 和数据是分离的，所有的页面更新，都需要通过对数据的更改来实现<br>小程序分为两个部分 <code>webview</code> 和 <code>appService</code> 。其中 <code>webview</code> 主要用来展现 <code>UI</code> ，<code>appService</code> 有来处理业务逻辑、数据及接口调用。它们在两个进程中运行，通过系统层 <code>JSBridge</code> 实现通信，实现 <code>UI</code> 的渲染、事件的处理</p> <h2 id="21、小程序的双向绑定和vue哪里不一样"><a href="#21、小程序的双向绑定和vue哪里不一样" class="headerlink" title="21、小程序的双向绑定和vue哪里不一样"></a>21、小程序的双向绑定和vue哪里不一样</h2><p>小程序直接 <code>this.data</code> 的属性是不可以同步到视图的，必须调用：</p> <figure class="highlight js"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="built_in">this</span>.setData(&#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 这里设置</span></span><br><span class="line">&#125;)</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h2 id="22、小程序的wxss和css有哪些不一样的地方"><a href="#22、小程序的wxss和css有哪些不一样的地方" class="headerlink" title="22、小程序的wxss和css有哪些不一样的地方"></a>22、小程序的wxss和css有哪些不一样的地方</h2><blockquote> <p><code>WXSS</code> 和 <code>CSS</code> 类似，不过在 <code>CSS</code> 的基础上做了一些补充和修改</p> </blockquote> <ul> <li>尺寸单位 <code>rpx</code></li> </ul> <p><code>rpx</code> 是响应式像素,可以根据屏幕宽度进行自适应。规定屏幕宽为 <code>750rpx</code>。如在 <code>iPhone6</code> 上，屏幕宽度为 <code>375px</code>，共有 <code>750</code> 个物理像素，则 <code>750rpx = 375px = 750</code> 物理像素</p> <ul> <li>使用 <code>@import</code> 标识符来导入外联样式。<code>@import</code> 后跟需要导入的外联样式表的相对路径，用;表示语句结束</li> </ul> <figure class="highlight css"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">/** index.wxss **/</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">@import</span> <span class="string">&#x27;./base.wxss&#x27;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"><span class="selector-class">.container</span>&#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attribute">color</span>: red;</span><br><span class="line">&#125;</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h2 id="23-小程序页面间有哪些传递数据的方法"><a href="#23-小程序页面间有哪些传递数据的方法" class="headerlink" title="23 小程序页面间有哪些传递数据的方法"></a>23 小程序页面间有哪些传递数据的方法</h2><ul> <li>使用全局变量实现数据传递</li> </ul> <p>在 <code>app.js</code> 文件中定义全局变量 <code>globalData</code>， 将需要存储的信息存放在里面</p> <figure class="highlight js"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">// app.js</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">App(&#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 全局变量</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">globalData</span>: &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">userInfo</span>: <span class="literal">null</span></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line">&#125;)</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>使用的时候，直接使用 <code>getApp()</code> 拿到存储的信息</p> <ul> <li>使用 <code>wx.navigateTo</code> 与 <code>wx.redirectTo</code> 的时候，可以将部分数据放在 <code>url</code> 里面，并在新页面 <code>onLoad</code> 的时候初始化</li> </ul> <figure class="highlight js"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">//pageA.js</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment">// Navigate</span></span><br><span class="line">wx.navigateTo(&#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">url</span>: <span class="string">&#x27;../pageD/pageD?name=raymond&amp;gender=male&#x27;</span>,</span><br><span class="line">&#125;)</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment">// Redirect</span></span><br><span class="line">wx.redirectTo(&#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">url</span>: <span class="string">&#x27;../pageD/pageD?name=raymond&amp;gender=male&#x27;</span>,</span><br><span class="line">&#125;)</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment">// pageB.js</span></span><br><span class="line">...</span><br><span class="line">Page(&#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">onLoad</span>: <span class="function"><span class="keyword">function</span>(<span class="params">option</span>)</span>&#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="built_in">console</span>.log(option.name + <span class="string">&#x27;is&#x27;</span> + option.gender)</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="built_in">this</span>.setData(&#123;</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">option</span>: option</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line">&#125;)</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>需要注意的问题：</p> <p><code>wx.navigateTo</code> 和 <code>wx.redirectTo</code> 不允许跳转到 <code>tab</code> 所包含的页面</p> <p><code>onLoad</code> 只执行一次</p> <ul> <li>使用本地缓存 <code>Storage</code> 相关</li> </ul> <h2 id="24-小程序的生命周期函数"><a href="#24-小程序的生命周期函数" class="headerlink" title="24 小程序的生命周期函数"></a>24 小程序的生命周期函数</h2><ul> <li><code>onLoad</code> 页面加载时触发。一个页面只会调用一次，可以在 <code>onLoad</code> 的参数中获取打开当前页面路径中的参数</li> <li><code>onShow()</code> 页面显示/切入前台时触发</li> <li><code>onReady()</code> 页面初次渲染完成时触发。一个页面只会调用一次，代表页面已经准备妥当，可以和视图层进行交互</li> <li><code>onHide()</code> 页面隐藏/切入后台时触发。 如 <code>navigateTo</code> 或底部 <code>tab</code> 切换到其他页面，小程序切入后台等</li> <li><code>onUnload()</code> 页面卸载时触发。如 <code>redirectTo</code> 或 <code>navigateBack</code> 到其他页面时</li> </ul> <h2 id="25、哪些方法可以用来提高微信小程序的应用速度"><a href="#25、哪些方法可以用来提高微信小程序的应用速度" class="headerlink" title="25、哪些方法可以用来提高微信小程序的应用速度"></a>25、哪些方法可以用来提高微信小程序的应用速度</h2><p>1、提高页面加载速度</p> <p>2、用户行为预测</p> <p>3、减少默认 <code>data</code> 的大小</p> <p>4、组件化方案</p> <h2 id="26、-微信小程序的优劣势"><a href="#26、-微信小程序的优劣势" class="headerlink" title="26、 微信小程序的优劣势"></a>26、 微信小程序的优劣势</h2><blockquote> <p>优势</p> </blockquote> <ul> <li>即用即走，不用安装，省流量，省安装时间，不占用桌面</li> <li>依托微信流量，天生推广传播优势</li> <li>开发成本比 <code>App</code> 低</li> </ul> <blockquote> <p>缺点</p> </blockquote> <ul> <li>用户留存，即用即走是优势，也存在一些问题</li> <li>入口相对传统 <code>App</code> 要深很多</li> <li>限制较多,页面大小不能超过2M。不能打开超过10个层级的页面</li> </ul> <h2 id="27-怎么解决小程序的异步请求问题"><a href="#27-怎么解决小程序的异步请求问题" class="headerlink" title="27 怎么解决小程序的异步请求问题"></a>27 怎么解决小程序的异步请求问题</h2><blockquote> <p>小程序支持大部分 <code>ES6</code> 语法</p> </blockquote> <ul> <li>在返回成功的回调里面处理逻辑</li> <li><code>Promise</code> 异步</li> </ul> <h2 id="28如何实现下拉刷新"><a href="#28如何实现下拉刷新" class="headerlink" title="28如何实现下拉刷新"></a>28如何实现下拉刷新</h2><ul> <li>首先在全局 <code>config</code> 中的 <code>window</code> 配置 <code>enablePullDownRefresh</code></li> <li>在 <code>Page</code> 中定义 <code>onPullDownRefresh</code> 钩子函数,到达下拉刷新条件后，该钩子函数执行，发起请求方法</li> <li>请求返回后，调用 <code>wx.stopPullDownRefresh</code> 停止下拉刷新</li> </ul> <h2 id="29-bindtap和catchtap的区别是什么"><a href="#29-bindtap和catchtap的区别是什么" class="headerlink" title="29 bindtap和catchtap的区别是什么"></a>29 bindtap和catchtap的区别是什么</h2><p>相同点：首先他们都是作为点击事件函数，就是点击时触发。在这个作用上他们是一样的，可以不做区分</p> <p>不同点：他们的不同点主要是bindtap是不会阻止冒泡事件的，catchtap是阻值冒泡的</p> <h2 id="30-简述下-wx-navigateTo-wx-redirectTo-wx-switchTab-wx-navigateBack-wx-reLaunch-的区别"><a href="#30-简述下-wx-navigateTo-wx-redirectTo-wx-switchTab-wx-navigateBack-wx-reLaunch-的区别" class="headerlink" title="30 简述下 wx.navigateTo(), wx.redirectTo(), wx.switchTab(), wx.navigateBack(), wx.reLaunch()的区别"></a>30 简述下 <code>wx.navigateTo()</code>, <code>wx.redirectTo()</code>, <code>wx.switchTab()</code>, <code>wx.navigateBack()</code>, <code>wx.reLaunch()</code>的区别</h5></h2><ul> <li>wx.navigateTo()：保留当前页面，跳转到应用内的某个页面。但是不能跳到 <code>tabbar</code> 页面</li> <li>wx.redirectTo()：关闭当前页面，跳转到应用内的某个页面。但是不允许跳转到 <code>tabbar</code> 页面</li> <li>wx.switchTab()：跳转到 <code>abBar</code> 页面，并关闭其他所有非 <code>tabBar</code> 页面</li> <li>wx.navigateBack()关闭当前页面，返回上一页面或多级页面。可通过 <code>getCurrentPages()</code> 获取当前的页面栈，决定需要返回几层</li> <li>wx.reLaunch()：关闭所有页面，打开到应用内的某个页面</li> </ul> <h1 id="第十二部分：手写代码"><a href="#第十二部分：手写代码" class="headerlink" title="第十二部分：手写代码"></a>第十二部分：手写代码</h1><h2 id="1、手写一个Promise"><a href="#1、手写一个Promise" class="headerlink" title="1、手写一个Promise"></a>1、手写一个Promise</h2><figure class="highlight plaintext"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">/**</span><br><span class="line"> * 自定义Promise函数模块</span><br><span class="line"> */</span><br><span class="line">(function () &#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> const PENDING = &#x27;pending&#x27;</span><br><span class="line"> const RESOLVED = &#x27;resolved&#x27;</span><br><span class="line"> const REJECTED = &#x27;rejected&#x27;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> * Promise构造函数</span><br><span class="line"> * @param &#123;*&#125; executor 执行器函数</span><br><span class="line"> */</span><br><span class="line"> function Promise(executor) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> const self = this</span><br><span class="line"> // 给promise对象指定status属性，初始值为pending</span><br><span class="line"> self.status = PENDING</span><br><span class="line"> // 给promise对象指定一个用于存储结果数据的属性</span><br><span class="line"> self.data = undefined</span><br><span class="line"> // 每个元素的结构 &#123; onResolved()&#123;&#125;, onRejected() &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> self.callbacks = []</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> function resolve(value) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 此处做判断，使得promise的状态只能修改一次</span><br><span class="line"> if (self.status === PENDING) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 将状态改为 resolved</span><br><span class="line"> self.status = RESOLVED</span><br><span class="line"> // 保存value数据</span><br><span class="line"> self.data = value</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> // 如果有待执行的callback函数，立即异步执行回调</span><br><span class="line"> if (self.callbacks.length &gt; 0) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> setTimeout(() =&gt; &#123; // 表示在异步队列中执行</span><br><span class="line"> self.callbacks.forEach(callbacksObj =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> callbacksObj.onResolved(value)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;, 0);</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> function reject(reason) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 此处做判断，使得promise的状态只能修改一次</span><br><span class="line"> if (self.status === PENDING) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 将状态改为 resolved</span><br><span class="line"> self.status = REJECTED</span><br><span class="line"> // 保存value数据</span><br><span class="line"> self.data = reason</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> // 如果有待执行的callback函数，立即异步执行回调</span><br><span class="line"> if (self.callbacks.length &gt; 0) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> setTimeout(() =&gt; &#123; // 表示在异步队列中执行</span><br><span class="line"> self.callbacks.forEach(callbacksObj =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> callbacksObj.onRejected(reason)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;, 0);</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> // 立即执行器</span><br><span class="line"> try &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> executor(resolve, reject);</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; catch (error) &#123; // 如果执行器抛出异常，promise状态变为rejected状态</span><br><span class="line"> reject(error)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> * Promise原型对象的then方法</span><br><span class="line"> */</span><br><span class="line"> Promise.prototype.then = function (onResolved, onRejected) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> const self = this</span><br><span class="line"> onResolved = typeof onResolved === &#x27;function&#x27; ? onResolved : value =&gt; value</span><br><span class="line"> // 指定默认的失败的回调（实现错误/异常穿透的关键点）</span><br><span class="line"> onRejected = typeof onRejected === &#x27;function&#x27; ? onRejected : reason =&gt; &#123; throw reason &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> return new Promise((resolve, reject) =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> * 处理onResolve和onRejected函数</span><br><span class="line"> * @param &#123;*&#125; callback </span><br><span class="line"> */</span><br><span class="line"> function resolvePromise(callback) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> try &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> const result = callback(self.data)</span><br><span class="line"> if (result instanceof Promise) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> result.then(resolve, reject)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; else if (result !== null &amp;&amp; (typeof result === &#x27;object&#x27; || typeof result === &#x27;function&#x27;)) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 拿到result.then</span><br><span class="line"> const then = result.then;</span><br><span class="line"> if (typeof then === &#x27;function&#x27;) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> then(resolve, reject)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; else &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> resolve(then)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; else &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> resolve(result)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; catch (error) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> reject(error)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> if (self.status === RESOLVED) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> setTimeout(() =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> * 1. 如果抛出异常，return 的 promise就会失败，reason就是error</span><br><span class="line"> * 2. 如果回调函数返回不是promise，return的promise就会成功，value就是返回值</span><br><span class="line"> * 3. 如果回调函数返回的是一个promise，return的promise的结果就是这个promise的结果，value就是返回值</span><br><span class="line"> */</span><br><span class="line"> resolvePromise(onResolved)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;, 0);</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; else if (self.status === REJECTED) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> setTimeout(() =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> resolvePromise(onRejected)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;, 0);</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; else &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> self.callbacks.push(&#123;</span><br><span class="line"> onResolved(value) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> resolvePromise(onResolved)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;,</span><br><span class="line"> onRejected(reason) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> resolvePromise(onRejected)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> * Promise原型对象的catch方法</span><br><span class="line"> */</span><br><span class="line"> Promise.prototype.catch = function (onRejected) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> return this.then(undefined, onRejected)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> * Promise函数对象的resolve方法</span><br><span class="line"> * </span><br><span class="line"> * 返回一个指定结果的成功的promise</span><br><span class="line"> */</span><br><span class="line"> Promise.resolve = function (value) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> return new Promise((resolve, reject) =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> if (value instanceof Promise) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> value.then(resolve, reject)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; else &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> resolve(value)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> * Promise函数对象的reject方法</span><br><span class="line"> */</span><br><span class="line"> Promise.reject = function (reason) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> return new Promise((resolve, reject) =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> reject(reason)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> * Promise函数对象的all方法</span><br><span class="line"> */</span><br><span class="line"> Promise.all = function (promises) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 判断数组</span><br><span class="line"> if (!(promises instanceof Array)) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> return Promise.reject(new Error(&#x27;params must be a Array!&#x27;))</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> // 用来保存所有数据成功value的数组</span><br><span class="line"> const resultArray = new Array(promises.length)</span><br><span class="line"> // 用来保存成功数量的计数</span><br><span class="line"> let resultCount = 0</span><br><span class="line"> return new Promise((resolve, reject) =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 遍历获取每个promise的结果</span><br><span class="line"> promises.forEach((p, index) =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> Promise.resolve(p).then(value =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> resultCount++</span><br><span class="line"> resultArray[index] = value</span><br><span class="line"> // 如果全部都成功了，将return的promise变为成功</span><br><span class="line"> if (resultCount === promises.length) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 表示成功</span><br><span class="line"> resolve(resultArray)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;, reason =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> reject(reason)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> * Promise函数对象的race方法</span><br><span class="line"> */</span><br><span class="line"> Promise.race = function (promises) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 判断数组</span><br><span class="line"> if (!(promises instanceof Array)) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> return Promise.reject(new Error(&#x27;params must be a Array!&#x27;))</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> return new Promise((resolve, reject) =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 遍历数组</span><br><span class="line"> promises.forEach((p, index) =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> Promise.resolve(p).then(value =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> resolve(value)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;, reason =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> reject(reason)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> // ---------------------------------------实现自己的方法---------------------------------------</span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> * 返回一个promise对象，它在指定的时间后才确定成功结果</span><br><span class="line"> * @param &#123;*&#125; value </span><br><span class="line"> * @param &#123;*&#125; time </span><br><span class="line"> */</span><br><span class="line"> Promise.resolveDelay = function (value, time) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> return new Promise((resolve, reject) =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> setTimeout(() =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> if (value instanceof Promise) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> value.then(resolve, reject)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; else &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> resolve(value)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;, time);</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> * 返回一个promise对象，它在指定的时间后才确定失败结果</span><br><span class="line"> * @param &#123;*&#125; reason </span><br><span class="line"> * @param &#123;*&#125; time </span><br><span class="line"> */</span><br><span class="line"> Promise.rejectDelay = function (reason, time) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> return new Promise((resolve, reject) =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> setTimeout(() =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> reject(reason)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;, time);</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> // 向外暴露函数</span><br><span class="line"> window.Promise = Promise</span><br><span class="line">&#125;)(window)</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h2 id="2、手写call-apply-bind实现详解"><a href="#2、手写call-apply-bind实现详解" class="headerlink" title="2、手写call,apply,bind实现详解"></a>2、手写call,apply,bind实现详解</h2><figure class="highlight plaintext"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">call 接收多个参数，第一个为函数上下文也就是this，后边参数为函数本身的参数。</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> let obj = &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> name: &quot;一个&quot;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> function allName(firstName, lastName) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> console.log(this)</span><br><span class="line"> console.log(`我的全名是“$&#123;firstName&#125;$&#123;this.name&#125;$&#123;lastName&#125;”`)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> // 很明显此时allName函数是没有name属性的</span><br><span class="line"> allName(&#x27;我是&#x27;, &#x27;前端&#x27;) //我的全名是“我是前端” this指向window</span><br><span class="line"> allName.call(obj, &#x27;我是&#x27;, &#x27;前端&#x27;) //我的全名是“我是一个前端” this指向obj</span><br><span class="line">复制代码</span><br><span class="line">apply</span><br><span class="line">apply接收两个参数，第一个参数为函数上下文this，第二个参数为函数参数只不过是通过一个数组的形式传入的。</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">allName.apply(obj, [&#x27;我是&#x27;, &#x27;前端&#x27;])//我的全名是“我是一个前端” this指向obj</span><br><span class="line">复制代码</span><br><span class="line">bind</span><br><span class="line">bind 接收多个参数，第一个是bind返回值返回值是一个函数上下文的this，不会立即执行。</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> let obj = &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> name: &quot;一个&quot;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> function allName(firstName, lastName, flag) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> console.log(this)</span><br><span class="line"> console.log(`我的全名是&quot;$&#123;firstName&#125;$&#123;this.name&#125;$&#123;lastName&#125;&quot;我的座右铭是&quot;$&#123;flag&#125;&quot;`)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> allName.bind(obj) //不会执行</span><br><span class="line"> let fn = allName.bind(obj)</span><br><span class="line"> fn(&#x27;我是&#x27;, &#x27;前端&#x27;, &#x27;好好学习天天向上&#x27;)</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> // 也可以这样用，参数可以分开传。bind后的函数参数默认排列在原函数参数后边</span><br><span class="line"> fn = allName.bind(obj, &quot;你是&quot;)</span><br><span class="line"> fn(&#x27;前端&#x27;, &#x27;好好学习天天向上&#x27;)</span><br><span class="line">复制代码</span><br><span class="line">接下来搓搓手实现call、apply和bind</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">实现call</span><br><span class="line"> let Person = &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> name: &#x27;Tom&#x27;,</span><br><span class="line"> say() &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> console.log(this)</span><br><span class="line"> console.log(`我叫$&#123;this.name&#125;`)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> // 先看代码执行效果</span><br><span class="line"> Person.say() //我叫Tom </span><br><span class="line"> Person1 = &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> name: &#x27;Tom1&#x27;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> // 我们尝试用原生方法call来实现this指向Person1</span><br><span class="line"> Person.say.call(Person1) //我叫Tom1</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line">复制代码</span><br><span class="line">通过第一次打印执行和第二次打印执行我发现，如果Person1有say方法那么Person1直接执行Person1.say() 结果就是我是Tom1,是的call就是这么实现的。 再看代码</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> Function.prototype.MyCall = function(context) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> //context就是demo中的Person1</span><br><span class="line"> // 必须此时调用MyCall的函数是say方法，那么我们只需要在context上扩展一个say方法指向调用MyCall的say方法这样this</span><br><span class="line"> console.log(this)</span><br><span class="line"> context.say = this //Mycall里边的this就是我们虚拟的say方法</span><br><span class="line"> context.say()</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> // 测试</span><br><span class="line"> Person.say.MyCall(Person1)//我叫Tom1</span><br><span class="line">复制代码</span><br><span class="line"> perfect！爆棚的满足感！不过拿脚趾头想想也不会这么简单，继续完善 我们自己找茬 1、call支持多个参数，有可能一个也不没有 2、考虑多参数时要把参数传给扩展方法。 3、给上下文定义的函数要保持唯一不能是say 4、扩展完我们需要吧自定义函数删除 接下来针对找茬问题一一解决</span><br><span class="line"> let Person = &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> name: &#x27;Tom&#x27;,</span><br><span class="line"> say() &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> console.log(this)</span><br><span class="line"> console.log(`我叫$&#123;this.name&#125;`)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> Person1 = &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> name: &#x27;Tom1&#x27;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> //如果没有参数</span><br><span class="line"> Person.say.call()</span><br><span class="line">复制代码</span><br><span class="line">没有指定this，this指向window</span><br><span class="line">我们也要这样</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> Function.prototype.MyCall = function(context) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 如果没有参数我们参考call的处理方式</span><br><span class="line"> context = context || window</span><br><span class="line"> //context就是demo中的Person1</span><br><span class="line"> // 必须此时调用MyCall的函数是say方法，那么我们只需要在context上扩展一个say方法指向调用MyCall的say方法这样this</span><br><span class="line"> context.say = this //Mycall里边的this就是我们虚拟的say方法</span><br><span class="line"> context.say()</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> Person.say.MyCall()</span><br><span class="line">复制代码</span><br><span class="line"> 没毛病！ 继续解决</span><br><span class="line">// 找茬2：我们默认定义context.say = this fn如果已经被占用 嘎嘎 sb了。 不怕 搞定它</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> // say需要是一个唯一值 是不是突然想到es6的新类型 Symbol fn = Symbol() 不过我们装逼不嫌事大 都说自己实现了</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> function mySymbol(obj) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 不要问我为什么这么写，我也不知道就感觉这样nb</span><br><span class="line"> let unique = (Math.random() + new Date().getTime()).toString(32).slice(0, 8)</span><br><span class="line"> // 牛逼也要严谨</span><br><span class="line"> if (obj.hasOwnProperty(unique)) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> return mySymbol(obj) //递归调用</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; else &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> return unique</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line">//接下来我们一并把多参数和执行完删除自定义方法删除掉一块搞定</span><br><span class="line"> Function.prototype.myCall1 = function(context) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 如果没有传或传的值为空对象 context指向window</span><br><span class="line"> context = context || window</span><br><span class="line"> let fn = mySymbol(context)</span><br><span class="line"> context.fn = this //给context添加一个方法 指向this</span><br><span class="line"> // 处理参数 去除第一个参数this 其它传入fn函数</span><br><span class="line"> let arg = [...arguments].slice(1) //[...xxx]把类数组变成数组，arguments为啥不是数组自行搜索 slice返回一个新数组</span><br><span class="line"> context.fn(...arg) //执行fn</span><br><span class="line"> delete context.fn //删除方法</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> let Person = &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> name: &#x27;Tom&#x27;,</span><br><span class="line"> say(age) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> console.log(this)</span><br><span class="line"> console.log(`我叫$&#123;this.name&#125;我今年$&#123;age&#125;`)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> Person1 = &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> name: &#x27;Tom1&#x27;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> Person.say.call(Person1,18)//我叫Tom1我今年18</span><br><span class="line">复制代码</span><br><span class="line">测试结果相当完美！</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">实现apply</span><br><span class="line">接下来apply就简单多了，只有多参数时第二个参数是数组，就不一步步细说了。</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> Function.prototype.myApply = function(context) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 如果没有传或传的值为空对象 context指向window</span><br><span class="line"> if (typeof context === &quot;undefined&quot; || context === null) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> context = window</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> let fn = mySymbol(context)</span><br><span class="line"> context.fn = this //给context添加一个方法 指向this</span><br><span class="line"> // 处理参数 去除第一个参数this 其它传入fn函数</span><br><span class="line"> let arg = [...arguments].slice(1) //[...xxx]把类数组变成数组，arguments为啥不是数组自行搜索 slice返回一个新数组</span><br><span class="line"> context.fn(arg) //执行fn</span><br><span class="line"> delete context.fn //删除方法</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line">复制代码</span><br><span class="line">实现bind</span><br><span class="line">这个和call、apply区别还是很大的，容我去抽根烟回来收拾它 还是老套路先分析bind都能干些什么，有什么特点 1、函数调用，改变this 2、返回一个绑定this的函数 3、接收多个参数 4、支持柯里化形式传参 fn(1)(2)</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> Function.prototype.bind = function(context) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> //返回一个绑定this的函数，我们需要在此保存this</span><br><span class="line"> let self = this</span><br><span class="line"> // 可以支持柯里化传参，保存参数</span><br><span class="line"> let arg = [...arguments].slice(1)</span><br><span class="line"> // 返回一个函数</span><br><span class="line"> return function() &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> //同样因为支持柯里化形式传参我们需要再次获取存储参数</span><br><span class="line"> let newArg = [...arguments]</span><br><span class="line"> console.log(newArg)</span><br><span class="line"> // 返回函数绑定this，传入两次保存的参数</span><br><span class="line"> //考虑返回函数有返回值做了return</span><br><span class="line"> return self.apply(context, arg.concat(newArg))</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> // 搞定测试</span><br><span class="line"> let fn = Person.say.bind(Person1)</span><br><span class="line"> fn()</span><br><span class="line"> fn(18)</span><br><span class="line">复制代码</span><br><span class="line"></span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h2 id="3、手写一个instanceOf"><a href="#3、手写一个instanceOf" class="headerlink" title="3、手写一个instanceOf"></a>3、手写一个instanceOf</h2><figure class="highlight plaintext"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">实现思路：</span><br><span class="line">首先 instanceof 左侧必须是对象, 才能找到它的原型链</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">instanceof 右侧必须是函数, 函数才会prototype属性</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">迭代 , 左侧对象的原型不等于右侧的 prototype时, 沿着原型链重新赋值左侧</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">复制代码</span><br><span class="line">// [1,2,3] instanceof Array ---- true</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">// L instanceof R</span><br><span class="line">// 变量R的原型 存在于 变量L的原型链上</span><br><span class="line">function instance_of(L,R)&#123; </span><br><span class="line"> // 验证如果为基本数据类型，就直接返回false</span><br><span class="line"> const baseType = [&#x27;string&#x27;, &#x27;number&#x27;,&#x27;boolean&#x27;,&#x27;undefined&#x27;,&#x27;symbol&#x27;]</span><br><span class="line"> if(baseType.includes(typeof(L))) &#123; return false &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> let RP = R.prototype; //取 R 的显示原型</span><br><span class="line"> L = L.__proto__; //取 L 的隐式原型</span><br><span class="line"> while(true)&#123; // 无线循环的写法（也可以使 for(;;) ）</span><br><span class="line"> if(L === null)&#123; //找到最顶层</span><br><span class="line"> return false;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> if(L === RP)&#123; //严格相等</span><br><span class="line"> return true;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> L = L.__proto__; //没找到继续向上一层原型链查找</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line">&#125;</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h2 id="4、手写一个防抖的实现"><a href="#4、手写一个防抖的实现" class="headerlink" title="4、手写一个防抖的实现"></a>4、手写一个防抖的实现</h2><figure class="highlight plaintext"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">!DOCTYPE html&gt;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line">&lt;html&gt;</span><br><span class="line">&lt;!-- 防抖 --&gt;</span><br><span class="line">&lt;!-- 防抖就是在n秒内 防止连续触发，在n秒内触发了下一次，那就重新计算 --&gt;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line">&lt;body&gt;</span><br><span class="line"> &lt;div id=&quot;content&quot;</span><br><span class="line"> style=&quot;height:150px;line-height:150px;text-align:center; color: #fff;background-color:#ccc;font-size:80px;&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</span><br><span class="line"> &lt;script&gt;</span><br><span class="line"> let num = 1;</span><br><span class="line"> let content = document.getElementById(&#x27;content&#x27;);</span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> *非立即执行版</span><br><span class="line"> **/</span><br><span class="line"> function debounceNoAtOnce(func, wait) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> let timeout;</span><br><span class="line"> return function () &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> let context = this;</span><br><span class="line"> let args = arguments;</span><br><span class="line"> if (timeout) clearTimeout(timeout);</span><br><span class="line"> timeout = setTimeout(() =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> func.apply(context, args)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;, wait);</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> *立即执行版</span><br><span class="line"> **/</span><br><span class="line"> function debounceAtOnce(func, wait) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> let timeout;</span><br><span class="line"> return function () &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> let context = this;</span><br><span class="line"> let args = arguments;</span><br><span class="line"> debugger</span><br><span class="line"> if (timeout) clearTimeout(timeout);</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> let callNow = !timeout;</span><br><span class="line"> timeout = setTimeout(() =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> timeout = null;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;, wait)</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> if (callNow) func.apply(context, args)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> *聚合版</span><br><span class="line"> **/</span><br><span class="line"> function debounce(func, wait, immediate) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> let timeout;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> return function () &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> let context = this;</span><br><span class="line"> let args = arguments;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> if (timeout) clearTimeout(timeout);</span><br><span class="line"> if (immediate) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> var callNow = !timeout;</span><br><span class="line"> timeout = setTimeout(() =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> timeout = null;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;, wait)</span><br><span class="line"> if (callNow) func.apply(context, args)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; else &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> timeout = setTimeout(function () &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> func.apply(context, args)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;, wait);</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> function count() &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> content.innerHTML = num++;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;;</span><br><span class="line"> content.onmousemove = debounce(count, 1000, true);</span><br><span class="line"> &lt;/script&gt;</span><br><span class="line">&lt;/body&gt;</span><br><span class="line">&lt;script&gt;</span><br><span class="line">&lt;/script&gt;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line">&lt;/html&gt;</span><br><span class="line">防抖的目的在于：n秒内点击多少次都算一次+每次点击都重新计算时间</span><br><span class="line"></span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h2 id="5、手写一个节流的实现"><a href="#5、手写一个节流的实现" class="headerlink" title="5、手写一个节流的实现"></a>5、手写一个节流的实现</h2><figure class="highlight plaintext"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line">&lt;html&gt;</span><br><span class="line">&lt;!-- 节流 --&gt;</span><br><span class="line">&lt;!-- 节流是为了固定的时间段内只能点击一次 --&gt;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line">&lt;body&gt;</span><br><span class="line"> &lt;div id=&quot;content&quot;</span><br><span class="line"> style=&quot;height:150px;line-height:150px;text-align:center; color: #fff;background-color:#ccc;font-size:80px;&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</span><br><span class="line"> &lt;script&gt;</span><br><span class="line"> let num = 1;</span><br><span class="line"> let content = document.getElementById(&#x27;content&#x27;);</span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> *throttleTime 时间戳版</span><br><span class="line"> **/</span><br><span class="line"> throttleTime = function (func, wait) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> let previde = 0;</span><br><span class="line"> return function () &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> let nowDate = Date.now();</span><br><span class="line"> if (nowDate - previde &gt; wait) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> func();</span><br><span class="line"> previde = nowDate;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> /**</span><br><span class="line"> *throttleSet 定时器版</span><br><span class="line"> **/</span><br><span class="line"> throttleSet = function (func, wait) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> let timeout;</span><br><span class="line"> return function () &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> if (!timeout) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> timeout = setTimeout(() =&gt; &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> timeout = false</span><br><span class="line"> func()</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;, wait)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"> function count() &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> content.innerHTML = num++;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;;</span><br><span class="line"> content.onmousemove = throttleSet(count, 1000);</span><br><span class="line"> &lt;/script&gt;</span><br><span class="line">&lt;/body&gt;</span><br><span class="line">&lt;script&gt;</span><br><span class="line">&lt;/script&gt;</span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line">&lt;/html&gt;</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>节流的目的在于：固定时间段内只能点击一次</p> <p>应用场景：输入框输入+提交/确定</p> <h2 id="6、手写ajax"><a href="#6、手写ajax" class="headerlink" title="6、手写ajax"></a>6、手写ajax</h2><figure class="highlight plaintext"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">function createXMLHTTPRequest() &#123; </span><br><span class="line"> //1.创建XMLHttpRequest对象 </span><br><span class="line"> //这是XMLHttpReuquest对象无部使用中最复杂的一步 </span><br><span class="line"> //需要针对IE和其他类型的浏览器建立这个对象的不同方式写不同的代码 </span><br><span class="line"> var xmlHttpRequest; </span><br><span class="line"> if (window.XMLHttpRequest) &#123; </span><br><span class="line"> //针对FireFox，Mozillar，Opera，Safari，IE7，IE8 </span><br><span class="line"> xmlHttpRequest = new XMLHttpRequest(); </span><br><span class="line"> //针对某些特定版本的mozillar浏览器的BUG进行修正 </span><br><span class="line"> if (xmlHttpRequest.overrideMimeType) &#123; </span><br><span class="line"> xmlHttpRequest.overrideMimeType(&quot;text/xml&quot;); </span><br><span class="line"> &#125; </span><br><span class="line"> &#125; else if (window.ActiveXObject) &#123; </span><br><span class="line"> //针对IE6，IE5.5，IE5 </span><br><span class="line"> //两个可以用于创建XMLHTTPRequest对象的控件名称，保存在一个js的数组中 </span><br><span class="line"> //排在前面的版本较新 </span><br><span class="line"> var activexName = [ &quot;MSXML2.XMLHTTP&quot;, &quot;Microsoft.XMLHTTP&quot; ]; </span><br><span class="line"> for ( var i = 0; i &lt; activexName.length; i++) &#123; </span><br><span class="line"> try &#123; </span><br><span class="line"> //取出一个控件名进行创建，如果创建成功就终止循环 </span><br><span class="line"> //如果创建失败，回抛出异常，然后可以继续循环，继续尝试创建 </span><br><span class="line"> xmlHttpRequest = new ActiveXObject(activexName[i]); </span><br><span class="line"> if(xmlHttpRequest)&#123; </span><br><span class="line"> break; </span><br><span class="line"> &#125; </span><br><span class="line"> &#125; catch (e) &#123; </span><br><span class="line"> &#125; </span><br><span class="line"> &#125; </span><br><span class="line"> &#125; </span><br><span class="line"> return xmlHttpRequest; </span><br><span class="line"> &#125; </span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h2 id="7、手写JSONP的原理和实现"><a href="#7、手写JSONP的原理和实现" class="headerlink" title="7、手写JSONP的原理和实现"></a>7、手写JSONP的原理和实现</h2><p>JSONP实现原理</p> <p>jsonp，其实就是单纯为了实现跨域请求而创造的一个欺骗(trick)。</p> <p>虽然，因为同源策略的影响，不能通过XMLHttpRequest请求不同域上的数据(Cross -origin reads)。但是，在页面上引入不同域上的js脚本文件却是可以的(Cross -origin embedding)。因此，在js文件载入完毕之后，触发回调，可以将需要的data作为参数传入<br>注意，实现方式(需前后端配合)</p> <p>优点</p> <p>兼容性好(兼容低版本IE)</p> <p>缺点</p> <p>JSONP只支持GET请求，XMLHttpRequest相对于JSONP有着更好的错误处理机制。</p> <p>实现</p> <p>1.服务端采用的是Node，服务端处理请求方法如下</p> <figure class="highlight javascript"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">router.get(<span class="string">&#x27;/&#x27;</span>, <span class="function"><span class="keyword">function</span>(<span class="params">req, res, next</span>) </span>&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="string">&#x27;收到客户端的请求：&#x27;</span>, req.query);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 传回到客户端的数据</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">let</span> data = <span class="built_in">JSON</span>.stringify(&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="string">&#x27;status&#x27;</span>:<span class="number">200</span>,</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="string">&#x27;result&#x27;</span>:&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="string">&#x27;name&#x27;</span>:<span class="string">&#x27;柳成荫&#x27;</span>,</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="string">&#x27;site&#x27;</span>:<span class="string">&#x27;123456&#x27;</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 获取方法名称 - 这是客户端传过来的方法名参数</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 因为这个方法名必须是客户端有的，必须要客户端告诉服务端是哪个方法</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">let</span> methodName = req.query.callback;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">let</span> methodStr = methodName + <span class="string">&#x27;(&#x27;</span> + data + <span class="string">&#x27;)&#x27;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 快速结束没有任何数据的响应，客户端会执行这个方法，从而获取到服务端返回的数据</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> res.end(methodStr)</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">&#125;);</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>2.封装JSONP</p> <figure class="highlight javascript"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">(<span class="function"><span class="keyword">function</span> (<span class="params">w</span>) </span>&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/**</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * jsonp的实现</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param <span class="type">&#123;Object&#125;</span><span class="variable">option</span></span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="function"><span class="keyword">function</span> <span class="title">jsonp</span>(<span class="params">option</span>) </span>&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 把success函数挂载在全局的getDate函数上</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> w.getData = option.success;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 处理url,拼接参数 - 回调方法是getData</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> option.url = option.url + <span class="string">&#x27;?callback=getData&#x27;</span>;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 创建script标签，并插入body</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">let</span> scriptEle = <span class="built_in">document</span>.createElement(<span class="string">&#x27;script&#x27;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> scriptEle.src = option.url;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="built_in">document</span>.body.appendChild(scriptEle);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 全局挂载一个jsonp函数</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> w.jsonp = jsonp;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)(<span class="built_in">window</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/**</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 把对象转换成拼接字符串</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 把形如</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> data:&#123;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> &quot;sex&quot;:&quot;男&quot;,</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> &quot;name&quot;:&quot;九月&quot;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> &#125;</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> 转换成sex=男&amp;name=九月</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param </span>paramObj 对象参数</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param <span class="variable">words</span></span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@returns <span class="type">&#123;string&#125;</span> </span>字符串</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="function"><span class="keyword">function</span> <span class="title">getStrWithObject</span>(<span class="params">paramObj,words</span>)</span>&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">let</span> resArr = [];</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 1.转换对象</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">for</span>(<span class="keyword">let</span> key <span class="keyword">in</span> paramObj)&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">let</span> str = key + <span class="string">&#x27;=&#x27;</span> + paramObj[key];</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> resArr.push(str);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> resArr.push(words);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 3.数组转换成字符串</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> resArr.join(<span class="string">&quot;&amp;&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>看似代码没有任何问题。但是，我们测试一下，多次调用jsonp方法。</p> <figure class="highlight javascript"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">jsonp(&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">url</span>:<span class="string">&#x27;http://localhost:3000/&#x27;</span>,</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">data</span>:&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="string">&quot;sex&quot;</span>:<span class="string">&quot;男&quot;</span>,</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="string">&quot;name&quot;</span>:<span class="string">&quot;九月&quot;</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;,</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">success</span>:<span class="function"><span class="keyword">function</span> (<span class="params">data</span>) </span>&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="built_in">console</span>.log(data);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> alert(<span class="number">1</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> </span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> jsonp(&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">url</span>:<span class="string">&#x27;http://localhost:3000/&#x27;</span>,</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">data</span>:&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="string">&quot;sex&quot;</span>:<span class="string">&quot;男&quot;</span>,</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="string">&quot;name&quot;</span>:<span class="string">&quot;九月&quot;</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;,</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">success</span>:<span class="function"><span class="keyword">function</span> (<span class="params">data</span>) </span>&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="built_in">console</span>.log(data);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> alert(<span class="number">2</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;);</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>结果会怎么样？的确，还是会执行2次，但是每次执行的都是第二个jsonp方法。这是为什么？</p> <p>问题出现在这里，多次调用，会发生函数覆盖。</p> <p><img src="https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20191218213657460.png" alt="img"></p> <p>解决方案就是让每一次调用函数名不一致，在JS里有很多方法，比如通过随机数、时间戳之类的。这里采用的是随机数，修改如下。</p> <figure class="highlight javascript"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">// 0.产生不同的函数名 - 解决了调用多次请求，造成覆盖的问题</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment">// 如果方法名相同，调用多次，都会执行最后一个，出现覆盖现象</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">let</span> callBackName = <span class="string">&#x27;lcy&#x27;</span> + <span class="built_in">Math</span>.random().toString().substr(<span class="number">2</span>) </span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">+ <span class="built_in">Math</span>.random().toString().substr(<span class="number">2</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment">// 把success函数挂载在全局的getDate函数上</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">w[callBackName] = option.success;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment">// 处理url,拼接参数</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">option.url = option.url + <span class="string">&#x27;?&#x27;</span> + getStrWithObject(option.data,<span class="string">&#x27;callback=&#x27;</span>+callBackName);</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p> 好，现在看似完美解决。然而，我们发现，每次调用jsonp方法，都会在body里插入一个script标签。我们并不希望在调用jsonp之后，添加这样一个标签，我们需要在调用完之后，将其移除。</p> <p>怎么做呢？我们在将success函数挂载在全局时，我们在success外层再套个函数。在这个函数里调用success方法之后，即已经请求到数据之后，我们就去把这个script标签给它移除就行了。修改如下</p> <figure class="highlight javascript"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">// 1.函数挂载在全局</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">w[callBackName] = <span class="function"><span class="keyword">function</span>(<span class="params">data</span>)</span>&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> option.success(data);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 删除script标签</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="built_in">document</span>.body.removeChild(scriptEle);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">&#125;;</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>整个过程就是这样，以下是完整代码。</p> <figure class="highlight javascript"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">(<span class="function"><span class="keyword">function</span> (<span class="params">w</span>) </span>&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/**</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * jsonp的实现</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param <span class="type">&#123;Object&#125;</span><span class="variable">option</span></span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="function"><span class="keyword">function</span> <span class="title">jsonp</span>(<span class="params">option</span>) </span>&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 0.产生不同的函数名 - 解决了调用多次请求，造成覆盖的问题</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 如果方法名相同，调用多次，都会执行最后一个，出现覆盖现象</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">let</span> callBackName = <span class="string">&#x27;lcy&#x27;</span> + <span class="built_in">Math</span>.random().toString().substr(<span class="number">2</span>) + <span class="built_in">Math</span>.random().toString().substr(<span class="number">2</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 1.函数挂载在全局</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> w[callBackName] = <span class="function"><span class="keyword">function</span>(<span class="params">data</span>)</span>&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> option.success(data);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 删除script标签</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="built_in">document</span>.body.removeChild(scriptEle);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 2.处理url</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> option.url = option.url + <span class="string">&#x27;?&#x27;</span> + getStrWithObject(option.data,<span class="string">&#x27;callback=&#x27;</span>+callBackName);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 3.创建script标签插入body</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">let</span> scriptEle = <span class="built_in">document</span>.createElement(<span class="string">&#x27;script&#x27;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> scriptEle.src = option.url;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="built_in">document</span>.body.appendChild(scriptEle);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> w.jsonp = jsonp;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;)(<span class="built_in">window</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/**</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 把对象转换成拼接字符串</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param </span>paramObj 对象参数</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@returns <span class="type">&#123;string&#125;</span> </span>字符串</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="function"><span class="keyword">function</span> <span class="title">getStrWithObject</span>(<span class="params">paramObj,words</span>)</span>&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">let</span> resArr = [];</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 1.转换对象</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">for</span>(<span class="keyword">let</span> key <span class="keyword">in</span> paramObj)&#123;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">let</span> str = key + <span class="string">&#x27;=&#x27;</span> + paramObj[key];</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> resArr.push(str);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> resArr.push(words);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">// 3.数组转换成字符串</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> resArr.join(<span class="string">&quot;&amp;&quot;</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h2 id="8、手写深拷贝"><a href="#8、手写深拷贝" class="headerlink" title="8、手写深拷贝"></a>8、手写深拷贝</h2><figure class="highlight plaintext"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">ar a = &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> name: &quot;muyiy&quot;,</span><br><span class="line"> book: &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> title: &quot;You Don&#x27;t Know JS&quot;,</span><br><span class="line"> price: &quot;45&quot;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;,</span><br><span class="line"> a1: undefined,</span><br><span class="line"> a2: null,</span><br><span class="line"> a3: 123</span><br><span class="line">&#125;</span><br><span class="line">// hasOwnProperty表示是否有自己的属性。这个方法会查找一个对象是否有某个属性，但是不会去查找它的原型链。</span><br><span class="line">function cloneDeep1(source) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> var target = &#123;&#125;;</span><br><span class="line"> for (var key in source) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> if (source.hasOwnProperty(key)) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> if (typeof source[key] === &#x27;object&#x27;) &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> target[key] = cloneDeep1(source[key]); // 注意这里</span><br><span class="line"> &#125; else &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> target[key] = source[key];</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> return target;</span><br><span class="line">&#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">// 使用上面测试用例测试一下</span><br><span class="line">console.log(a)</span><br><span class="line">var b = cloneDeep1(a);</span><br><span class="line">a.name = &quot;前端进阶&quot;;</span><br><span class="line">a.book.price = &quot;55&quot;;</span><br><span class="line">console.log(b);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">考虑再全一些的深拷贝</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">function deepClone(obj,hash = new WeakMap())&#123; //递归实现</span><br><span class="line"> if(obj instanceof RegExp) return new RegExp(obj);</span><br><span class="line"> if(obj instanceof Date) return new Date(obj);</span><br><span class="line"> if(obj === null || typeof obj != &quot;object&quot;)&#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 普通数据类型</span><br><span class="line"> return obj;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> if(hash.has(obj))&#123;</span><br><span class="line"> return hash.get(obj);</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> // 下面是数组和对象的判断</span><br><span class="line"> let t = new obj.constructor();</span><br><span class="line"> hash.set(obj,t);</span><br><span class="line"> for(let key in obj)&#123;</span><br><span class="line"> // 递归</span><br><span class="line"> if(obj.hasOwnProperty(key))&#123; //是否是自身的属性</span><br><span class="line"> t[key] = deepClone(obj[key],hash)</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> &#125;</span><br><span class="line"> return t;</span><br><span class="line">&#125;</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h2 id="9、bind"><a href="#9、bind" class="headerlink" title="9、bind"></a>9、bind</h2><figure class="highlight plaintext"><table><tr><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">function print() &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> console.log(this.name, ...arguments);</span><br><span class="line">&#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">const obj = &#123;</span><br><span class="line"> name: &#x27;mxin&#x27;,</span><br><span class="line">&#125;;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">// Function.prototype.__bind()</span><br><span class="line">console.log(&#x27;Function.prototype.__bind()&#x27;);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">// 直接调用，返回原函数拷贝，this 指向 obj</span><br><span class="line">const F = print.__bind(obj, 26);</span><br><span class="line">F(178); // mxin, 26, 178</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">// new 情况</span><br><span class="line">const _obj = new F(145); // undefined, 26, 145</span><br><span class="line">console.log(_obj); // print &#123;&#125;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">// Function.prototype.bind()</span><br><span class="line">console.log(&#x27;Function.prototype.bind()&#x27;);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">const Fn = print.bind(obj, 26);</span><br><span class="line">Fn(178); // mxin, 26, 178</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">const __obj = new Fn(145); // undefined, 26, 145</span><br><span class="line">console.log(__obj); // print &#123;&#125;</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h2 id="10-call"><a href="#10-call" class="headerlink" title="10 call"></a>10
